ygData.subject: Re: Web Page Update
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, the web page that was updated contains some very good blacksmithing information.  You d be surprised how many of these home pages contain wonderful
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, the web page that was updated contains some very good
blacksmithing information. You'd be surprised how many of these home pages
contain wonderful exclusive information. I for one welcome notification of
updates.. that's frequently the only way you'd hear of some of these
excellent small sites. That site in particular has excellent info on how
to get your smithing skill into the banded armor range... I highly
recommend it.

Geran
Magician (and Smith) of Povar
